headline: Kroger plans to name former Walmart exec Greg Foran as new CEO, report
summary: Cincinnati-based supermarket giant Kroger will name former Walmart executive Greg Foran, 64, as its next CEO, according to a report by the Wall Street Journal.

content.title: Kroger plans to name former Walmart exec Greg Foran as new CEO, report
content.summary: Cincinnati-based supermarket giant Kroger will name former Walmart executive Greg Foran, 64, as its next CEO, according to a report by the Wall Street Journal.

thumbnail.caption: The Kroger building features new branding in downtown Cincinnati on Tuesday, April 22, 2025.

headline: These Stocks Are Today’s Movers: Hims & Hers, Novo Nordisk, Micron, Kroger, STMicroelectronics, Nvidia, and More
summary: Stock futures were falling Monday with investors concerned a relief rally from the end of last week may not have legs.  Hims & Hers Health  sank 16% after the online drug retailer said Saturday it would no longer offer a compounded pill version of  Novo Nordisk  popular weight-loss medicine Wegovy following increased scrutiny from federal regulators.  Novo Nordisk’s American depositary receipts gained 6.4% on Monday.

content.title: These Stocks Are Today’s Movers: Hims & Hers, Novo Nordisk, Micron, Kroger, STMicroelectronics, Nvidia, and More
content.summary: Stock futures were falling Monday with investors concerned a relief rally from the end of last week may not have legs. Novo Nordisk’s American depositary receipts gained 6.4% on Monday.

headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Novo Nordisk, Hims & Hers, Apollo
summary: ↗️ Novo Nordisk (NVO), (DK:NOVO.B): The Danish drugmaker's stock gained more than 8% after Hims & Hers (HIMS) said it will stop offering a copycat version of Novo Nordisk's weight-loss pill. Shares in Hims & Hers slumped in premarket trading.

headline: Kroger Plans to Appoint Ex-Walmart Executive Foran as CEO
summary: Kroger replaced CEO Rodney McMullen in March after an investigation into his personal conduct, which followed a failed $24.6 billion merger with Albertsons Cos. that was blocked on antitrust grounds.  Kroger is expected to announce the choice of Foran as early as Monday, said the person, who declined to be named because they were not authorized to speak on the matter.

content.title: Kroger Plans to Appoint Ex-Walmart Executive Foran as CEO
content.summary: Kroger replaced CEO Rodney McMullen in March after an investigation into his personal conduct, which followed a failed $24.6 billion merger with Albertsons Cos. that was blocked on antitrust grounds.  Kroger is expected to announce the choice of Foran as early as Monday, said the person, who declined to be named because they were not authorized to speak on the matter.

headline: Kroger names former Walmart executive as its new CEO
summary: Kroger named former Walmart executive Greg Foran as its chief executive officer on Monday, 11 months after the abrupt resignation of its previous CEO.  Foran led Walmart's U.S. division for six years before departing in 2019.  While there, he introduced online ordering and pickup, and accelerated Walmart's digital capabilities.

headline: Kroger's new CEO Greg Foran says he has 'best job on the planet'
summary: Kroger has tapped a former top Walmart executive, Greg Foran, 64, as its new CEO, the nation’s largest supermarket operator said.

headline: Kroger Appoints Greg Foran as Chief Executive Officer
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced its Board of Directors appointed Greg Foran as Chief Executive Officer, effective immediately. Foran will also join Kroger's Board of Directors and succeeds Ron Sargent, who served as interim CEO since March 2025. This announcement follows an extensive search process conducted by the Board to identify an innovative retail leader with a strong track record of execution at scale.

content.title: Kroger Appoints Greg Foran as Chief Executive Officer
content.summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced its Board of Directors appointed Greg Foran as Chief Executive Officer, effective immediately. Foran will also join Kroger's Board of Directors and succeeds Ron Sargent, who served as interim CEO since March 2025. This announcement follows an extensive search process conducted by the Board to identify an innovative retail leader with a strong track record of execution at scale.
